introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is かわ which you will often hear in daily life when talking about fruits, trees, or skin care. Understanding its various applications will deepen your grasp of the language and enrich your conversations.
meaning_explanation_english: The word かわ means "skin," "shell," or "bark" in English. It's often used to refer to the outer layer of something, whether it's skin on a body, the bark of a tree, or the shell of a fruit.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 表面 : ひょうめん : surface
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the word かわ are おもて and そとかわ. おもて refers to the surface or face of an object, often used to talk about appearance. そとかわ primarily refers to the exterior layer of something, emphasizing its outer shell.
antonyms: 内側 : うちがわ : inside
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of the word かわ are なかみ and うちがわ. なかみ refers to the contents or the inside part of an object, while うちがわ means the inner side or inside, both distinguishing the internal aspect from the external one represented by かわ.

example_sentences.furigana: りんごの皮(かわ)をむく。

example_sentences.kanji: このりんごはつるつるの皮です。
example_sentences.furigana: このりんごはつるつるの皮(かわ)です。

translations.EN: This apple has a smooth skin.
translations.ID: Apel ini memiliki kulit yang halus.
translations.ES: Esta manzana tiene una piel suave.
translations.FR: Cette pomme a une peau lisse.
translations.KO: 이 사과는 매끈한 껍질을 가지고 있어요.
translations.TL: Ang mansanas na ito ay may makinis na balat.
translations.MY: ဒီပန်းသီးမှာ ကြည်လင်တောက်ပသော အရေထေးရှိပါတယ်။
translations.HI: इस सेब की त्वचा चिकनी है।

example_sentences.furigana: りんごの皮(かわ)をむく。

translations.MY: ပန်းသီးအရေကိုခွာပါ။

example_sentences.kanji: このリンゴはかたい皮です。
example_sentences.furigana: このリンゴはかたい皮(かわ)です。

translations.EN: This apple has a hard skin.
translations.ID: Apel ini memiliki kulit yang keras.
translations.ES: Esta manzana tiene una piel dura.
translations.VI: Quả táo này có vỏ cứng.
translations.FR: Cette pomme a une peau dure.
translations.ZH: 这个苹果有一个很硬的皮。
translations.KO: 이 사과는 딱딱한 껍질을 가지고 있어요.
translations.TL: May matigas na balat ang mansanas na ito.
translations.MY: ဒီဖြူသီးမှာ မာယာတဲ့အရည်ပုပ်လေးရှိတယ်။
translations.HI: इस सेब की त्वचा कठोर है।

example_sentences.kanji: 彼は困難に直面して皮を厚くする。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は困難(こんなん)に直面(ちょくめん)して皮(かわ)を厚(あつ)くする。

translations.EN: He faces difficulties and thickens his skin.
translations.ID: Dia menghadapi kesulitan dan mengentalkan kulitnya.
translations.ES: Enfrenta dificultades y endurece su piel.
translations.VI: Anh ấy đối mặt với khó khăn và làm dày da của mình.
translations.FR: Il fait face à des difficultés et épaissit sa peau.
translations.NE: उ ऊपत्त्यका सामना गर्दै छ र आफ्नो छालालाई बाक्लो बनाउँदै छ।
translations.BN: সে বাধার সম্মুখীন হন এবং তার চামড়া মোটা করে।
translations.ZH: 他面临困难并使皮肤变厚。
translations.KO: 그는 곤란에 직면하여 마음을 굳게 한다.
translations.TL: Hinaharap niya ang mga pagsubok at pinapalakas ang loob.
translations.MY: သူဟာ အခက်အခဲတွေကို ရင်ဆိုင်ပြီး အသားချပ်ထူနေပါတယ်။
translations.HI: वह कठिनाइयों का सामना करता है और अपनी त्वचा को मोटा करता है।
translations.AR: يواجه الصعوبات ويجعل جلده أكثر سمكًا.
translations.FA: او با مشکلات روبرو می‌شود و پوست خود را ضخیم می‌کند.

skin.MY: အရေပြား : အရေပြား

shell.MY: အရေပြား : ဖောင်ချယ်
